chapters.title: Chapter 3: A Fan of Colors
chapters.info: Setalle Anan, p. 133 (148)—Stately former innkeeper of The Wandering Woman, the inn at which Mat and Olver stayed at in Ebou Dar. She has hazel eyes, marking her a non-native to Ebou Dar. She worked closely with the Kin, and knew of their existance despite not being a part of them. She has a regal presence, and has a touch of gray in her hair.
